display_name: Childhood Adenotonsillectomy Trial (CHAT) Obstructive and Mixed Apnea Index (AHI): (Obstructive apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ mixed apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal) / hour of sleep from type I polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.
calculation: 60*(oarbp +  oarop  + oanbp  + oanop + marbp + marop + manrbp + manrop) / slpprdp
